actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the act commonly known as the Miller Act to raise the dollar amount of contracts to which such Act applies from $2,000 to $25,000.

summary.text: Amends the Miller Act which requires performance bonds on specified Federal construction contracts by increasing the dollar amount of contracts to which such Act applies from $2,000 to $25,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act commonly known as the Miller Act to raise the dollar amount of contracts to which such Act applies from $2,000 to $25,000.
